title: Bleisetzer-Tagebuch — Letterpress Blog
content:
You are interested in where you as a modern typograph are coming from?  
So visit my Letterpress Blog to make sure to see the most wonderful german lead letters:

[Bleisetzer-Tagebuch](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101084112/http:/www.bleisetzer.de/tagebuch/inhaltsverzeichnis.html)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101084112im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Letterpress_6090.jpg)
author: Bleisetzer
